comment._content: INFANTICIDE CHARGED North Carolina Youth Accused Of Drowning His Own Baby MOTHER MAKES CONFESSION Young Girl Says She Consented To Child's Murder Under Threat Of Being Deserted April 17, 1914 Miss Laura Pendleton, confessed mother of the infant, will be tried as an accessory. Tbe crime was committed on January 30. ... pqasb.pqarchiver.com/baltsun/access/1774565062.html?FMT=C...
